physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Unremarkable physical examination; fatigue, occasional insomnia, weight loss, occasional palpitations reported.
Symptoms of opioid withdrawal including sweating, rhinorrhea, abdominal cramping observed after emergency room visit.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Withdrawal symptoms were consistent with opioid dependence, indicating progression of condition.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild abdominal cramping and insomnia on first day of buprenorphine therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Feeling much better after the second dose; no detectable opioid withdrawal symptoms after 6 days.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Reported disrupted sleep lasting about 6 hours per night; daytime sedation had subsided.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Overall improvements noted in energy and daytime functioning after detoxification.
